description: This file defines an Angular service named AuthService that manages authentication workflows, including login, signup, and logout, communicating with backend APIs via ApiHttpService. It maintains user authentication state using AppStore and exposes reactive signals for current user info. It is designed to be SSR-safe and integrates with Angular's dependency injection system.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Provides authentication-related methods such as login, signup, and logout, managing user state and communication with backend services.

methods.name: currentUser
methods.description: Returns a reactive signal of the current authenticated user, or null if no user is authenticated.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs login operation with email and password, updates user state upon success, and navigates to the profile page.

methods.name: signup
methods.description: Performs user registration with name, email, and password, updates user state upon success, and navigates to the profile page.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears authentication tokens and user state, and redirects to the login page.

ctags.name: res
ctags.pattern: /^      const res = await this.api.post<{ token: string; user: AppUser }>($/
